item.title: Intrepid Potash Inc 10-K
item.description: Intrepid Potash Inc, which is in the Mining, Quarrying Of Nonmetallic Minerals (No Fuels) [1400] industry, SEC 10-K filing on March 07, 2023 had 37605 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: potash - 443 instances 2022 - 324 instances sales - 306 instances water - 284 instances operations - 245 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here.
